DOC.brief_summary: The increase overweight obesity young Italian people , nowadays show several epidemiological data , relate misuse alcohol lack nutritional knowledge . Thus aim study investigate different nutritional knowledge could affect body composition drink habit cohort local young people . 104 healthy subject ( 56 male 54 female ) recruit use oral advertisement among student 18-19 years-old belonging Istituto Agrario Istituto alberghiero Raineri-Marcora Piacenza . The subject ask complete questionnaire alcohol consumption another one relate nutritional knowledge . Then anthropometric data measure : height , weight , waist hip circumference , waist-hips ratio skinfolds evaluate subject body fat mass calculate .
DOC.brief_title: Alcohol Consumption Relation With Nutritional Knowledge Body Weight
DOC.criteria: student pregnant breast feeding vegan vegetarian
